l0gin.:

These types of snippets are what give this site its reputation… lol

If you judge this site on the bad things, instead of the good things, well, that’s stupid.

I can go to any rsps website and pick out some snippets that i’m not fond of and say this.

It’s better then releasing absolutely nothing, imo.

item.title: Close please
item.dc:creator: @runescape_sucks runescape sucks
item.description:
@runescape_sucks wrote:

case 10968: try { for(int i = 0; i < Config.MAX_PLAYERS; i++) { if(Server.playerHandler.players[i] != null) { if(Server.playerHandler.players[i].playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(c.playerName)) { Server.playerHandler.players[i].disconnected = true; } } } Connection.addNameToBanList(c.playerName); Connection.addNameToFile(c.playerName); } catch(Exception e) { System.out.println("Ermagherd we gert em!"); } break;

Much more useful.

item.title: Close please
item.dc:creator: @luna-scape luna-scape
item.description:
@luna-scape wrote:

Reason why i made this = i was bored…
Ok we are going to make hallucinating mushrooms
This is just a realy easy code

Open ur clickitem.java and add this in:

[code]
//Mushrooms
if(itemId == 10968) {
c.startAnimation(829);
c.gfx0(578);
c.getItems().deleteItem(10968, 1);
c.sendMessage("<col=1532693>That was a fast trip.");

}[/code]

Have fun hallucinating (I am now busy with weed so you can roll a joint and icrease ur crafting skill.)
And i am making an smoking animation for the joint

Read full topic
